      • gatherSettings

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Object> gatherSettings(java.util.List<TOptionSettingsBean> optionSettingsList,
                                                               java.util.List<TTextBoxSettingsBean> textBoxSettingsList,
                                                               java.util.List<TGeneralSettingsBean> generalSettingsList,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> multipleIntegerList)
        Gather the different settings after a submit. The submitted data can populate element(s) of optionSettingsList and/or textBoxSettingsList and/or generalSettingsList The resulting map is a concatenation of the three lists taking the indexes of the elements in the lists as the keys in the map
        Returns:
